patterns: Have you done any programming projects?
Can I see some of your work?
Are there any coding projects I can look at?
What code have you written in your spare time?
Does you have a Github account?
Where can I view some of your work?
Is there any work you can show me?
responses: I have built an array of data science and programming projects. You can view some of my work in the 'Projects' section or visit my Github at https://github.com/oliverdenton

patterns: Do you have any work experience?
What positions have you held in the past?
Where did you go to school?
What do you do for a living?
responses: I interned at DSTL in the A.I. research team as a data scientist this summer. I am currently in third year studying artificial intelligence and computer science at the University of Sheffield where I am a lab demonstrator for three modules, and completing a dissertation in deep leanrning and computational neuroscience. I have also written a few articles for a publication called Data Driven Investor which you can view in the 'Writings' section.

patterns: How can I talk to you?
How can I get in touch with you?
Does he have a LinkedIn account?
Can I connect with you on LinkedIn?
Where can I discuss opportunties with you?
I would like to offer you a job
responses: My email address is ojdenton1@sheffield.ac.uk or connect with me on LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/oliver-denton1/ where I am always happy to discuss opportunities and new ideas!

responses: I have used a variety of languages and frameworks incluiding Java, Python, PyTorch, JavaScript, React, Haskell, CSS, Bootstrap, Ruby and more. See 'Skills' and 'Projects' sections for more information.
